description:
The Proclamation of 12 August 1997 provides the geographical coordinates for Nauruâ€™s contiguous zone as declared under Sea Boundaries Act 1997. The geographical coordinates are expressed in terms of the World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS84), which is a geocentric reference ellipsoid having a major (equatorial) radius of 6,378.137 metres and a flattening of 1/298.257 223 563.

https://www.un.org/depts/los/LEGISLATIONANDTREATIES/PDFFILES/NRU_1997_Proclamation.pdf
https://www.un.org/depts/los/LEGISLATIONANDTREATIES/PDFFILES/NRU_1971_Act.pdf
name: Nauru Contiguous Zone (24 Nautical Miles)
